price: Nanso mmuaeε a ne nkorͻfoͻ no de maeε ara ne sε, wͻkaa sε: “Montu Lut ne ne nkorͻfoͻ no mfri mo kuro no mu. Nokorε sε wͻyε nnipa a wɔdi wͻn ho ni (anaa wͻrepε akyerε sε wͻn na wͻdi wͻn ho ni).
arabic: ۞ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَخۡرِجُوٓاْ ءَالَ لُوطٖ مِّن قَرۡيَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُمۡ أُنَاسٞ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: famā kāna jawāba qawmihi illā an qālū akhrijū āla lūṭin min qaryatikum innahum unāsun yataṭahharūna
